feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: High Surf Advisory issued October 24 at 9:57AM AKDT until October 26 at 7:00AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 7 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... The National Weather Service in Anchorage has issued a High Surf Advisory, which is in effect from 1 PM Tuesday to 7 AM AKDT Wednesday. * LOCATION...Kipnuk to Togiak.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Bristol Bay; Kuskokwim Delta

entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TUESDAY TO 1 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, highest amounts from Soldotna north to Nikiski. * WHERE...Western Kenai Peninsula. * WHEN...From 10 AM Tuesday to 1 AM AKDT Wednesday.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 23 at 3:50PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...SNOW POSSIBLE ACROSS THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE... Confidence is increasing in the potential for accumulating snow across the northern panhandle late Tuesday night into Wednesday. entry.cap:areaDesc: City and Borough of Juneau; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 9:56AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...ELEVATED FIRE DANGER THIS AFTERNOON AND EARLY EVENING... Avoid open burning if possible this afternoon and early evening.
